ch0195_00_ghetsis/0101_0701_01_10:
My word, if it isn’t [Name:PlayerNickname ].
Training again today, I presume?
ch0195_00_ghetsis/0101_0701_02_10:
Allow me to be the one to determine whether you
have what it takes to be a hero.
ch0195_00_ghetsis/7101_0701_01_10:
Here on Pasio, Trainers create bonds with their
partner Pokémon and connect with them on a
deep level.
ch0195_00_ghetsis/7101_0701_02_10:
They try so hard despite the fact that they will one
day choose to part ways with those Pokémon.
ch0195_00_ghetsis/7105_0701_01_10:
I wonder, [Name:PlayerNickname ], do you
have what it takes to be a ruler?
ch0195_00_ghetsis/7105_0701_02_10: I originally set up a certain man as a king...
ch0195_00_ghetsis/7105_0701_03_10:
but I now know that I had no chance of
controlling a freak who lacked a human heart.
ch0195_00_ghetsis/7105_0701_04_10:
But you, [Name:PlayerNickname ]... You’re
different from that freak. I have high hopes
for you.
ch0195_00_ghetsis/1701_0701_01_10: I thought I might run into you if I waited here.
ch0195_00_ghetsis/1701_0701_02_10: Allow me to entrust this to your care.
ch0195_00_ghetsis/1701_0702_01_10:
If you are, in fact, worthy of a crown, I’m sure
you’ll be able to put that to good use.
ch0195_00_ghetsis/2501_0701_01_10:
Bonds between Pokémon and people? What
nonsense! Wouldn’t you agree?
ch0195_00_ghetsis/2501_0701_02_10:
Humans and Pokémon aren’t even the same
category of living creature. There’s no way we
could expect to understand each other.
ch0195_00_ghetsis/2501_0702_01_10:
In the end, Pokémon are nothing more than
tools of convenience.
ch0195_00_ghetsis/2501_0702_02_10: In that sense, I do indeed trust my “partner.”
ch0195_00_ghetsis/3001_0701_01_10:
How fortunate for you! Few get to be the sole
audience member for one of my speeches.
ch0195_00_ghetsis/3003_0701_01_10:
Why, hello. You’re welcome to join Team Plasma
anytime, you know.
ch0195_00_ghetsis/3005_0701_01_10:
Good evening. When you sleep tonight, perhaps
you’ll dream of all the Pokémon in the world being
liberated. Wouldn’t that be wonderful?
